title: Aircooled '14 - New Aircooled only event 27th-29th June 2014

posts.content:
So after talking about it for the last few years we've finally got plans in place for an Aircooled Only VW Show for 2014.

Heres some preliminary information:

Dates - 27th-29th June 2014
Location - Stratford Racecourse, Stratford Upon Avon, Warwickshire.

Its been hard finding a date that doesnt clash with other events and are currently looking at this as a Bi Annual show to alternate with the EBI event held in Belgium, so have chosen the the dates that EBI would have been on.

We are in the early stages of planning with tickets going on sale in the new year, likely cost is going to be £25 per adult for the weekend with kids going free but will finalise that once tickets go on sale.

The whole inner area of the racecourse is available for the show & campsite with the plan to make the campsite area for aircooled vehicles part of the main show rather than as a separate camping area, due to this the only vehicles allowed into this area will be aircooled apart from support vehicles belonging to traders & caterers.

There will obviously be the obligatory 'Line ups' as well as other Club Displays and plan to have a number of trophies including Best Club Stand but these will be based on Vehicles & Club stands within the Aircooled Camping area itself rather than having to move vehicles.

We are hoping that the trade area will be selling aircooled parts only and associated items, we would rather turn away trade stalls than fill the site with what I regard as 'tat'.

Theres lots more ideas in the pipeline and once these have been finalised we'll post more details.

We are currently talking to traders, sponsors, caterers etc so if you know anyone that has a trade stall or they fancy becoming a show sponsor then put them in touch, email address for the show is graham@aircooledevents.com

What makes us thing we can make a success of this?, well for those that don't know Midland Early Bay was initially set up alongside my event project management business an industry that I've worked in for over 25 years. These days I spend more time buying, selling and working on buses but still do the odd event here and there for long term clients, so running and managing events is not something new to me.
This sounds good
Sounds like a great show Graham. Count me in.

Tickets have just gone on sale for this.

Early Bird Tickets until the end of March for £22.50, Advance tickets after the end of March £25.00. Tickets will be available on the gate only if we have space available so 'Book early to avoid disappointment.

We have now got 2 DJ Stars from the EarlyBay Forum playing on the Friday & Saturday Night.

Vintage Bike Paddock & Vintage Bike Racing (Cruisers & 20" Shoppers) organised by the infamous 'Hudson Bear'

Round One of Battle of the Bays, a seperate event listing will be created for this.

.........and the Belgium Beer Van bringing you those beers you love so much, Witkap, Jupiler, Westmalle & Chimay plus we are working on a Cider Bar as well.

So to take part in all of this click the link below for tickets or follow us on Facebook here

Get Your Tickets for AIRCOOLED 14 Here

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

I like the sound of this

how are ticket sales going Graham ?

Mark
Website now gone live http://www.aircooledevents.com with more details, ticket & camping info etc etc

Awesome Graham.

Will be nice to go to a show that is pure again. ..... and local... ish!




Steve.
Looking forward to this one.

OK so only 11 days left of early bird tickets for the show at the reduced rate of £22.50 per adult for the whole weekend.

We've also had a few requests to ask whether dogs are allowed and they are as long as they are kept under control and any mess is cleaned up after them.

Also if you guys want to put on a club display/camp just let me know how many vehicles and I'll get it sorted
Looking forwards to hanging out with friends here

Battle of the 'Bays' and Vintage Bike racing is going to go down well with my lad!

+ Belgian beers! Farmers market in town to pick up some awesome BBQ food too!!
What more could you ask!?

Great.
Looks good, hope to pop down for weekend

Well in 2 weeks time we will be on site at AIRCOOLED 14 so yesterday we took a visit to the Stratford Beer & Cider Festival also held at the racecourse to do a site recce , ground conditions are very good so lets hope for similar weather in the next 2 weeks.

Don't forget advance ticket sales end this coming Friday 20th June so still a few days to save yourself some money
Working on getting Jess's van on the road for this. On the road not "working"
